segments.text: I need to copy some pages in my book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The copier is right over there , in the corner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I need to pay to use it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to pay to use the copier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to pay ten cents for every copy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there a maximum number of copies I can make ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can make as many copies as you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I â€™ m going to need you to show me how to use the machine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are instructions posted on the copier .
segments.speaker: S1
